verses.text_plain: Let thine ear now be attentive, and thine eyes open, that thou mayest hear the prayer of thy servant, which I pray before thee now, day and night, for the children of Israel thy servants, and confess the sins of the children of Israel, which we have sinned against thee: both I and my father’s house have sinned.
verses.verse_html: 6Let thine ear now be attentive, and thine eyes open, that thou mayest hear the prayer of thy servant, which I pray before thee now, day and night, for the children of Israel thy servants, and confess the sins of the children of Israel, which we have sinned against thee: both I and my father’s house have sinned.

tokens.definition: אִישׁ ʼîysh, eesh; contracted for H582 (or perhaps rather from an unused root meaning to be extant); a man as an individual or a male person; often used as an adjunct to a more definite term (and in such cases frequently not expressed in translation):—also, another, any (man), a certain, champion, consent, each, every (one), fellow, (foot-, husband-) man, (good-, great, mighty) man, he, high (degree), him (that is), husband, man(-kind), none, one, people, person, steward, what (man) soever, whoso(-ever), worthy. Compare H802 .
tokens.kjv_translation_count: man (1,: 002x), men (210x), one (188x), husband (69x), any (27x), miscellaneous (143x).
outline: man man, male (in contrast to woman, female) husband human being, person (in contrast to God) servant mankind champion great man
man, male (in contrast to woman, female)
human being, person (in contrast to God)

tokens.definition: מֶלֶךְ melek, meh'-lek; from H4427 ; a king:—king, royal.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: king (2,: 518x), royal (2x), Hammelech (1x), Malcham (1x), Moloch (1x).

tokens.definition: שָׁקָה shâqâh, shaw-kaw'; a primitive root; to quaff, i.e. (causatively) to irrigate or furnish a potion to:—cause to (give, give to, let, make to) drink, drown, moisten, water. See H7937 , H8354 .
tokens.kjv_translation_count: drink (43x), water (17x), butler (9x), cupbearer (3x), miscellaneous (1x).
outline: to give to drink, irrigate, drink, water, cause to drink water (Hiphil) to water, irrigate to water, give drink to (Pual) to be watered (Niphal) variant
(Hiphil) to water, irrigate to water, give drink to
